timeline.bodyText:
Should not we use Operators.onNextDropped here?
operators discard is Reactor only feature, so someone who uses another framework (yeah, if reactor meets non-reactor publisher, then SerializedSubscriber applies) then it is going to be impossible to handle discarded element at all.
Also, I found it really confusing having onDrop and discard unintegrated, which means that if no on discard hooks, most likely onDrop should be applied and element should find at least something
